data.name: Stripped of Title: Backlash — Episode 1
data.detailed_description:
Stripped of Title: Backlash is a 3d adventure in the "walking simulator" genre featuring modern graphics, deep story and plenty of adult content.

Features:

  • Plenty of quests with branching dialogue and carefully crafted cutscenes to enhance the story.
  • A wide range of fully animated uncensored sex scenes.
  • Partial voice acting.
  • Modern 3d graphics powered by Unreal Engine. Using the engine's high-end rendering we are able to make our girls look better then ever!
  • Highly detailed environments featuring several biomes.

WISHLIST NOW, or else...

data.short_description: Stripped of Title is an adult quest that follows the story of Bernadette. Forced to pay her Father's debt, she was reduced to poverty. Hunger, irregular work, demanding clients - her life is a nightmare. One day she learns about an ancient treasure, and the following events change her life forever.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8, 10, 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1300X; Intel® Core™ i5-6400
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R9 270X; NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: System Requirements may change before EA release
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8, 10, 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1300X; Intel® Core™ i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX Vega 56; NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: System Requirements may change before EA release

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains mature themes, hand-holding and realistic fully 3D-animated, explicit sex scenes.
Strong language, infrequent depiction of tobacco and alcohol.
